info.name: Twitter hide opaque box behind content
info.description:
Hides opaque box behind dashboard and timeline giving a cleaner look to page

(Want an even cleaner look? try using with style 60715)
info.additionalInfo: This style applies globally. To apply only to pages with "https://" at the start of their URL, replace "domain("twitter.com")" with "url-prefix("https://twitter.com/")" in first line of code.
